Actions.Name: Landwrack
Actions.Effects: Create a height 1 ruin object adjacent to the character.

Actions.Name: Entropus
Actions.Description: A character in range 6 of the ruin speaker is marked and starts to petrify.
Actions.Mark: While marked, they take [D] piercing damage at the end of their turns if they end their turn adjacent to or inside an object or terrain effect.

Actions.Name: Earthglide
Actions.Description: Dash 3. Gain phasing and become intangible while moving.

Actions.Name: Welcome
Actions.Description: The Ruin Speaker creates a lowlander trap in a free space in range 6.
